main event: On November 2, 1964, two couples reported witnessing a strange hovering light in the sky in Pescadero, California. They fled the scene as the light flashed and moved unexpectedly.
interesting points: The light was described to be about the size of a basketball by the witnesses., The witnesses believed they would be 'cooked' if they stayed near the light., Deputies could not locate the light when they arrived at the scene., The couples reported that the light pulsated and moved rapidly., One witness compared the light's motion to that of a full moon.
sighted object: a strange light hovering in the sky
witness description: two couples who wished to remain anonymous
